abstract: The book by Greg Smith, a former employee of Goldman Sachs, isn’t scheduled to be released until Monday. But some details are already coming to light.

lead_paragraph: The book by Greg Smith, a former employee of Goldman Sachs, isn’t scheduled to be released until Monday. But some details are already coming to light.

headline.main: Sneak Peeks Into New Book on Goldman Sachs
